The phrase "für verschiedene Entschädigungen" should be "to cover various damages owed" not "for various compensation" - this is about covering debts/damages. The phrase "für Aufwendungen für die Gerichtsstreite" should be "to meet the cost of judicial disputes" not "for court costs" - more specific language. The phrase "sogar für das Bausparen" should be "and even to cover building society savings" not "even for savings" - "building society" is the specific type of savings

Corrected translation: The budget is almost three billion shot to cover various damages owed to the victims of communism and crime, to meet the cost of judicial disputes, and even to cover building society savings.

The key concept that these are historical records that can be "read" (interpreted) is lost in favor of simple visual observation
